value:
Gaaah... It's not like I didn't want to
fulfill my duties to the Holy Guard.$k$pBut when debt collectors started
hanging around the barracks, I
just had to do something.

My brother's not a bad person, he
just likes gambling and...doesn't work.
So he borrows money and... Ugh.

Everyone here works so hard...
I get it more than ever now—my
brother really is super lazy!

Aaah! O-oh, it's just you,
$Nu.$k$pPhew... For a second, I thought
a debt collector had somehow
followed me here.

I wanted to do the right thing, so I
wrote a letter of resignation when I
left the Begnion Holy Guard.$k$pBut...I'm not sure that will be enough
for the deputy commander. I-I really
hope she isn't mad at me...

Hmm... I wonder how much I could
make if I sold this... Oh, I'm just
curious is all!

Where are you, Brother?! Next time
I find your worthless hide, I'm going
to knock some sense into you!

I was considered one of the most
promising rookies in the Holy Guard,
so don't you dare underestimate me!

Ugh... C'mon... I'm going to turn
out like my brother at this rate.

Are you sure? You'd give this to a
lowly deserter like me?! Wow, there
really are nice people out there, huh?

I'm Marcia! Have you seen my brother,
Makalov? He's got a mangy mop of
hair that's the same color as mine!

Did I ever tell you why I'm trying to
find my brother? Yeah, that's right.
His debt.$k$pHe didn't even have a good reason
to borrow all of that money—it was
all just to amuse himself.$k$pTo be honest, even if I DO somehow
manage to find him, it's not like I can
just wipe away all his debts...$k$pBut I have to find him. For his
own sake.$k$pIf I don't set him straight, he'll never
become a respectable member of
society! Plus, I...$k$pHe used my name to borrow money...
I can't inconvenience the knights. So
I did the only thing I could: resign.$k$pBut now? Oh, they'll see what I can
do! I'll become a mercenary, work my
butt off, and make a ton of money!
てやっ
ケダモノ…！
きゃあっ
いっけない…！
What say I run you through?!
This one's mine!
I'll beat some sense into you!
Irresponsible skunk!
Tried a bit too hard...
Heheh.
It's me, Marcia! I'm going to join your group.
*yelp* Oh, it's you. Crackers! I was sure you were a debt collector...
I used to be in the Begnion Holy Guard, but...I had to quit.

I'm searching for my missing brother. He's kind of
a dolt and a scoundrel.

The Begnion pegasus knights were always moving around,
so I learned to pack quickly.
It's all my brother's fault. *sigh*
Anything you need, just say the word. I'll give it my all.
You got it!
I wonder...
Oh! It's you!
